snippet: Silvio Berlusconi, the former Italian prime minister, said his center-right party would continue to support Italy’s coalition government, releasing some political tension that has built since his definitive conviction for tax fraud.
abstract: Silvio Berlusconi says that his center-right party will continue to support Italy's fragile coalition government, releasing some of the political tension that has built in the country since his definitive conviction for tax fraud.
lead_paragraph: Silvio Berlusconi, the former Italian prime minister, said his center-right party would continue to support Italy’s coalition government, releasing some political tension that has built since his definitive conviction for tax fraud.

headline.main: Berlusconi Says Party to Back Italy’s Coalition
